alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Otsego County through 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Exeter Center, or 9 miles northwest of Cooperstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Richfield Springs, Cherry Valley, Exeter Center, Salt Springville, Glimmerglass State Park and East Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
